title: Trump: Hyundai investing $5.8B in first U.S. steel mill in Louisiana
shortDescription: Trump touted Hyundai's $5.8 billion in its first U.S. steel mill in Louisiana was a result of threatened tariffs on overseas manufacturing.

title: White House Easter Egg Roll goes corporate under Trump
shortDescription: The White House under President Trump has opened up this year's Easter Egg Roll to corporate sponsors that pay as much as $200,000.

title: Second judge blocks Trump's Pentagon policy banning transgender troops
shortDescription: A federal judge temporarily blocked the Pentagon's ban on transgender service to prevent the removal of two Air Force sergeants while case is argued

title: Trump chooses his former lawyer Alina Habba as top NJ attorney
shortDescription: President Donald Trump chose Alina Habba, a loyal defender in court and on TV, to serve as interim New Jersey U.S. attorney.

title: Teachers' union sues Trump admin over Education Dept. dismantling
shortDescription: Trump's executive order trying to dismantle the Education Department is "unlawful," according to a lawsuit from the second largest teacher's union.

title: Supreme Court hears racial challenge to Louisiana's congressional map
shortDescription: The case tests the balancing act states must strike in protecting the voting power of a racial minority while not discriminating against other voters.

title: Trump envoy blasted for 'insane' praise of Vladimir Putin
shortDescription: In an interview with Tucker Carlson on Friday, Steve Witkoff, President Donald Trump's lead negotiator, heaped praise on Vladimir Putin.

title: Trump rages on Truth Social about portrait of him hanging in Colorado
shortDescription: Donald Trump claims a "distorted" portrait of him hung in Colorado was the governor's doing. But it was commissioned by state Republicans.

title: Trump vows 25% tariff on countries that buy oil, gas from Venezuela
shortDescription: President Trump on Monday said the U.S. will impose a 25% tariff on imports from countries that purchase oil or gasoline from Venezuela.

title: Trump challenges order to rehire federal workers at Supreme Court
shortDescription: Trump's administration brought its bid to purge the federal workforce to the Supreme Court on Monday, challenging a judicial directive to rehire government employees.

title: President Trump shares post accusing judges of 'sedition and treason'
shortDescription: President Trump reposted an article on social media accusing judges of "sedition and treason" when they overturn executive actions.

title: Trump, lawyers clash over lawsuits - and 2016
shortDescription: Trump directed the Justice Department to investigate law firms behind "frivolous" lawsuits. Opponents say it's an attack on the rule of law.

title: GOP could raise student loan bills to pay for Trump's tax cuts
shortDescription: Millions of student loan borrowers could be stuck paying more as GOP lawmakers considering ending repayment plans to fund Trump's tax cuts.

title: South Korean court reinstates impeached PM Han Duck-soo as acting president
shortDescription: South Korea's top court reinstated Han Duck-soo as acting president as he pledged to focus on steering the nation through a U.S. "trade war".

title: GAO to review health and safety effects of Trump's mass firings
shortDescription: The Government Accountability Office's decision came at the request of Democratic lawmakers led by Sen. Elizabeth Warren.
